attributes.action: Make it law that any person using a mobile phone whilst driving recieves a atoumatic ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law on mobile phone use while driving has become a joke, I urge you to join me in changing the law so that persons caught whilst driving recieves an automatic 6 months ban from driving.There is no excuse hand free sets are now very affordable
